section.para: To update Item Prices by Pricing Schedule, select the "Update Prices by Pricing Schedule" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: This utility updates Item Prices found on Pricing Schedules only. It will not update discount percentages, nor List Prices.

section.para: When updating Prices by Pricing Schedule, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Pricing Schedule whose Prices you want to update.
Update Prices for the selected Pricing Schedule. Select Percent or Fixed Amount to specify how you want to update pricing.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without updating Item Prices by Pricing Schedule, returning you to the application desktop.
Updates Item Prices by Pricing Schedule, using the specified parameters.
